attributes.action: Shouldn't it be illegal for the government stopped selling taxpayer owned property's and company's to shore up their bad management
attributes.additional_details: All government since the thatcher admin and before have sold taxpayer owned assets in the name of progress rather than running them correctly and thereby increasing the countries wealth, ensuring our future and reducing the burden of tax, after all selling an asset gives a short term boost, a continued profit , a future, all governments use the taxpayer as a cash cow and this must stop
